name: Rainforest
description: A lush rainforest teems with life and valuable resources, but the constant humidity and dense vegetation make travel exhausting. The complex ecosystem provides medicine and food, while dangerous creatures and diseases pose constant threats.
atmosphere: Living, breathing entity with overwhelming life. Multiple canopy layers with sounds from every direction - bird calls, insect buzzes, unseen creature rustles. Dense green maze. Constant moisture makes everything feel alive and growing. Thick, humid air scented of earth, flowers, and growth-decay cycle.
